messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] patient amusement
messages.msgSnippet: patient amusement --Thank you i kept looking for the words and they just wouldn t come that s it! I m young with two young one s and i get that a lot! kathy
messages.messageBody:
"patient amusement"--Thank you
i kept looking for the words and they just wouldn't come
that's it!
I'm young with two young one's and i get that a lot!
kathy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] patient amusement
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/10/00 1:54:34 AM Eastern Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/10/00 1:54:34 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:

<< This has been my experience. I get looks a patient amusement when other
Christians learn I don't spank. >>

Thanks Kris, for this great phrase, "patient amusement", referring to that
LOOK we get when someone 'knows better' and feels 'sorry' for us at the same
time. I get this all the time, because i have one child, a very spirited 3
year old, and everyone smiles patronizingly saying, "Is he your first"????

cath
